description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 5/08/2006

After Ridge collapses in front of Stephanie, she calls for help.  Hector and the paramedics take Ridge to the hospital. Thorne keeps a worried Stephanie company while they wait for information on Ridge’s condition. Christian arrives to help operate on Ridge. Stephanie blames herself as she feels she caused Ridge to collapse.  Later, Stephanie is with Ridge when he moans for Brooke.  Dante proposes to a shocked Bridget and tries to convince her to say yes.  Nick and Brooke take a trip to Cabo San Lucas.
